column4: newbie here so sorry because I know that this question is probably common.  On "system monitor" I can only see one of my hard drives, I mounted the other one before, but is there a way to make it mount so it stays on all the time?
you want to use gparted to create new partitions (ext3 file system format) & add the partitions to /etc/fstab (use blkid to get the UUIDs)
